about.description: Extensible code style checker currently supporting Fortran, PSyclone DSL, etc

name: stylist
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "stylist" %}
{% set version = "0.1" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: e178164596e20e719a8b15963ad37369c85beec356a652314e878d8173da505d

build:
  entry_points:
    - stylist=stylist.__main__:main
  noarch: python
  number: 1
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python >=3.6
  run:
    - fparser
    - python >=3.6

test:
  imports:
    - stylist
  commands:
    - stylist --help

about:
  home: https://github.com/MetOffice/stylist
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Extensible code style checker
  description: |
    Extensible code style checker currently supporting Fortran, PSyclone DSL, etc
  doc_url: https://github.com/MetOffice/stylist
  dev_url: https://github.com/MetOffice/stylist

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - matthewrmshin
    - MatthewHambley
